_IfClause.description:
Condition(s) that a PackageRecord must satisfy to be patched.
If more than one condition is specified, they are combined with a logical AND.

not_arch.description: Negated condition: 'arch' value to compare against with `eq` operator
not_arch.title: Not Arch

not_arch_eq.description: Negated condition: 'arch' value to compare against with `eq` operator
not_arch_eq.title: Not Arch Eq

not_arch_ne.description: Negated condition: 'arch' value to compare against with `ne` operator
not_arch_ne.title: Not Arch Ne

not_arch_in.description: Negated condition: List of 'arch' values to match against. A single scalar value is also allowed.
not_arch_in.title: Not Arch In

not_build.description: Negated condition: 'build' value to compare against with `eq` operator
not_build.title: Not Build

not_build_eq.description: Negated condition: 'build' value to compare against with `eq` operator

not_build_in.title: Not Build In

has_depends.description: Spec or list of specs that should be present in the 'depends' list.
has_depends.title: Has Depends

has_constrains.description: Spec or list of specs that should be present in the 'constrains' list.
has_constrains.title: Has Constrains

artifact_in.description: List of full artifact filenames to match against; e.g. `ngmix-2.3.0-py38h50d1736_1.conda`
artifact_in.title: Artifact In

not_has_depends.description: Negated condition: Spec or list of specs that should be present in the 'depends' list.
not_has_depends.title: Not Has Depends

not_has_constrains.description: Negated condition: Spec or list of specs that should be present in the 'constrains' list.
not_has_constrains.title: Not Has Constrains

not_artifact_in.description: Negated condition: List of full artifact filenames to match against; e.g. `ngmix-2.3.0-py38h50d1736_1.conda`
not_artifact_in.title: Not Artifact In

_IfClause.title: _IfClause

lower_bound.description: Explicit lower bound version to apply to the package (e.g. `1.0`). Will be >=[value] if provided.
lower_bound.title: Lower Bound

upper_bound.description: Explicit upper bound version to apply to the package (e.g. `2.0`). Will be <[value] if provided.
upper_bound.title: Upper Bound

other.description: List of additional constraints to apply to the package (e.g. `['~=1.2.5', '!=1.3.*']`). Overrides any existing 'other' constraints. To clear existing 'other' constraints, set 'other' to an empty string.
other.title: Other

max_pin.description: Maximum version pin expression to apply to the package (e.g. `x.x`).
max_pin.title: Max Pin

upper_bound.description: Explicit upper bound version to apply to the package (e.g. `2.0`).
upper_bound.title: Upper Bound

reset_depends.description: Reset the dependencies to the specified value(s)
reset_depends.title: Reset Depends

reset_constrains.description: Reset the constraints to the specified value(s)
reset_constrains.title: Reset Constrains

remove_track_features.description: Remove item(s) from track_features to matched packages
remove_track_features.title: Remove Track Features

add_track_features.description: Add item(s) to track_features for matched packages
add_track_features.title: Add Track Features

rename_depends.description: Rename 'old' dependency as 'new', leaving version and build string fields untouched.

rename_constrains.description: Rename 'old' constraint as 'new', leaving version and build string fields untouched.

relax_exact_depends.description: Relax an exact pin (e.g., `blah ==1.0.0`) to something like blah `>=1.0.0` and possibly with `,<2.0a0` added if max_pin='x'

tighten_depends.description: Make a dependency version constraint stricter

loosen_depends.description: Make a dependency version constraint looser

then.description: List of operations to apply to matched records
then.title: Then
